about_the_game:
Tune your sensors to receive this transmission of 25 BGM tracks that will carry you into the far flung future! Set the mood in dystopian city-worlds, desolate alien landscapes, and the home planet of your robot overlords. Boldly battle cyborgs, navigate modern menus, and chart a path through techno dungeons with this mighty music pack.

Features:

- 30 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, field, menus, and towns!
- 100 scifi SFX! Blasters, beeps, strange noises, powerups, and other otherworldly audio!
- 10 useful music events (MEs) that are great for transtions or short moments that need an extra touch!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

Atmosphere - Deep Scan
Atmosphere - Eventful Horizon
Atmosphere - Stellar Nursery
Atmosphere - Temporal Instability
Battle - Bullet Time
Battle - Cyber Thugs
Battle - Disruptor Ray
Battle - Rampaging Robots
Battle - Shadowrunners Showdown
Dungeon - Cell Block 1138
Dungeon - Enemy Installation
Dungeon - Heart of the Machine
Dungeon - Machinehead Union
Dungeon - Xenobiotic Tubes
Field - Alien Spore Zone
Field - Dark City Dwellers
Field - Ecumenopolis
Field - Exploring The Rim
Field - Lunar Crash Site
Field - Nexus Six
Menu - Android Dreams
Menu - Binary Suns
Menu - Mission Briefing
Menu - Serious Decisions
Menu - Stardust Memory
Town - Abandoned Research Center
Town - Funky Future Shop
Town - Memories Of Home
Town - Pristine Elysium
Town - Star Refuge

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Music Pack - $24.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Blast off to adventure with these 30 BGM tracks and 100 SFX! Explore lost worlds, battle cybernetic foes, or delve into the heart of the machine with this futuristic music pack.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
